attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/advanced-knuckle-mastery.png} tip={Advanced Knuckle Mastery (4th Job)} val={+70%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+400%}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Strength Training (2nd Job)} val={+60}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/freuds-wisdom.png} tip={Freud's Wisdom (5th Job)} val={+55}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-gods-favor.png} tip={Fox God's Favor - Passive (1st Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/total-harmony.png} tip={Total Harmony (3rd Job)} val={+20}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/freuds-wisdom.png} tip={Freud's Wisdom (5th Job)} val={+25}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/loaded-dice.png} tip={Loaded Dice (5th Job)} val={+40}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/overdrive.png} tip={Overdrive (5th Job)} val={+80% of base weapon attack power} val={-15% of base weapon power while on cooldown}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-gods-favor.png} tip={Fox God's Favor - Passive (1st Job)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/foxy-courage.png} tip={Foxy Courage (2nd Job)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/total-harmony.png} tip={Total Harmony (3rd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg type={debuff} src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/weaken.png} tip={Weaken (3rd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/heroic-memories.png} tip={Heroic Memories (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-bond-3.png} tip={Spirit Bond 3 (3rd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-bond-4.png} tip={Spirit Bond 4 (4th Job)} val={+30%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/freuds-wisdom.png} tip={Freud's Wisdom (5th Job)} val={+25%}>

build: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/vulpes-leap.png} tip={Vulpes Leap}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-gods-favor.png} tip={Fox God's Favor}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/cosmic-balance.png} tip={Cosmic Balance}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/flash-fist.png} tip={Flash Fist}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-bond-2.png} tip={Spirit Bond 2}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/knuckle-mastery.png} tip={Knuckle Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/foxy-courage.png} tip={Foxy Courage}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits.png} tip={Fox Spirit Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/blade-imp-forward-slash.png} tip={Blade Imp - Forward Slash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/back-step.png} tip={Back Step}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/ground-pound.png} tip={Ground Pound}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/total-harmony.png} tip={Total Harmony}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/harmonious-defense.png} tip={Harmonious Defense}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/summon-other-spirit.png} tip={Summon Other Spirit}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-bond-3.png} tip={Spirit Bond 3}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/weaken.png} tip={Weaken}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/blade-imp-spin-slash.png} tip={Blade Imp - Spin Slash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-trap.png} tip={Spirit Trap}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-frenzy.png} tip={Spirit Frenzy}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/shockwave-punch.png} tip={Shockwave Punch}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/advanced-knuckle-mastery.png} tip={Advanced Knuckle Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/critical-insight.png} tip={Critical Insight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-bond-4.png} tip={Spirit Bond 4}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/heartfelt-communion.png} tip={Heartfelt Communion}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/bomb-punch.png} tip={Bomb Punch}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-ward.png} tip={Spirit Ward}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/soul-splitter.png} tip={Soul Splitter}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/death-mark.png} tip={Death Mark}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-claw.png} tip={Spirit Claw}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: [For Bossing]<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-claw-reinforce.png} tip={Spirit Claw - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-claw-boss-rush.png} tip={Spirit Claw - Boss Rush}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-claw-extra-strike.png} tip={Spirit Claw - Extra Strike}> Spirit Claw - Reinforce, Boss Rush, and Extra Strike_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits-repeated-attack-bonus.png} tip={Fox Spirits - Repeated Attack Bonus}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits-summon-chance.png} tip={Fire Fox Spirits - Summon Chance}> Fox Spirits - Repeated Attack Bonus and Summon Chance_>[For Training]<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/bomb-punch-reinforce.png} tip={Bomb Punch - Reinforce}> Bomb Punch - Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/bomb-punch-spread.png} tip={Bomb Punch - Spread}> Bomb Punch - Spread OR <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/bomb-punch-critical-chance.png} tip={Bomb Punch - Critical Chance}> Bomb Punch - Critical Chance_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits-reinforce.png} tip={Fox Spirits - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits-repeated-attack-bonus.png} tip={Fox Spirits - Repeated Attack Bonus}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits-summon-chance.png} tip={Fire Fox Spirits - Summon Chance}> Fox Spirits - Reinforce, Repeated Attack Bonus, and Summon Chance_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-claw.png} tip={Spirit Claw (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits.png} tip={Fox Spirits (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-frenzy.png} tip={Spirit Frenzy (3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/bomb-punch.png} tip={Bomb Punch (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/death-mark.png} tip={Death Mark (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/soul-splitter.png} tip={Soul Splitter (4th Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/flash-fist.png} tip={Flash Fist (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/ground-pound.png} tip={Ground Pound (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/blade-imp-forward-slash.png} tip={Blade Imp (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits.png} tip={Fox Spirits (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/shockwave-punch.png} tip={Shockwave Punch (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-frenzy.png} tip={Spirit Frenzy (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-trap.png} tip={Spirit Trap (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/summon-other-spirit.png} tip={Summon Other Spirit (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/bomb-punch.png} tip={Bomb Punch (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-claw.png} tip={Spirit Claw (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/death-mark.png} tip={Death Mark (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/soul-splitter.png} tip={Soul Splitter (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-incarnation.png} tip={Spirit Incarnation (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Shade Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Infographic

primary.name: Fox Trot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20. Teleports you to the furthest enemy in range.\nWhen no enemies are around, you'll be teleported forward 300.
primary.desc: Teleport to the nearest enemy within range
details: If no enemies within range, teleports forward
Can be used while casting other skills

primary.name: Spirit Bond 1
primary.shortDesc: Recovers 1% HP on direct skill attacks.\nKnockback Resistance: 100%, Damage Taken: -30%

primary.name: Spirit Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Minion Duration +5%

primary.name: Heart Grown Fonder
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, summon Shade's guardian spirit.\nCooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Allows you to hide/show the guardian spirit visual effect
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/86/Even_If_You_Forget_Me} title={"Even If You Forget Me"}>

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/86/Even_If_You_Forget_Me} title={"Even If You Forget Me"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Swift Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 205%, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Strike forward consecutively up to two times
details: Completing the Shade storyline upgrades the skill to <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/flash-fist.png} tip={Flash Fist (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Flash Fist
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 138%, Number of Attacks: 4

primary.name: Vulpes Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>

primary.name: Fox God's Favor
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Duration: 200 sec, Attack Speed: +1\n[Passive Effect: Attack Power: +20, Damage: +10%]

primary.name: Cosmic Balance
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +500, Max HP: +20%,  Max MP: +20%.

primary.name: Ground Pound
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Strike forward

primary.name: Fox Spirits
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 15, 40% chance to summon Fox Spirits when landing direct skill attacks.
10% summon chance when hitting a boss with Bomb Punch.
Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 2
The spirits disappear after attacking up to 2 times.
primary.desc: While toggled, successful direct attack skills have a chance to create Fox Spirits that seek and attack enemies up to 2 times
details: Reduced chance to create Fox Spirits when attacking bosses with <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/bomb-punch.png} tip={Bomb Punch (4th Job)}>
Prioritizes bosses with the highest Max HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Blade Imp - Direct
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, determines Blade Imp's direction\nCooldown: 2 sec
primary.desc: Using the Arrow Keys, choose between 3 types of Blade Imp attacks
details: [Left - Forward] <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/blade-imp-forward-slash.png} tip={Blade Imp - Forward Slash (2nd Job)}>
[Right - Downward] <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/blade-imp-downward-slash.png} tip={Blade Imp - Downward Slash (2nd Job)}>
[Up - Spin] <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/blade-imp-spin-slash.png} tip={Blade Imp - Spin Slash (2nd Job)}>
Shares Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/blade-imp-forward-slash.png} tip={Blade Imp - Forward Slash}>

primary.name: Blade Imp - Forward Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 155%, Number of Attacks: 4\nBlade Imp - Trap: lasts 120 seconds, final damage from Shade's attack on marked enemies by 10%\nCooldown: 1 sec.
primary.desc: Pulls enemies in front of you towards you and applies a debuff
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from Shade
All Blade Imp skills share the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot

primary.name: Blade Imp - Downward Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 155%, Number of Attacks: 4\nBlade Imp - Trap: lasts 120 seconds, final damage from Shade's attack on marked enemies by 10%\nCooldown: 1 sec.
primary.desc: Pulls enemies above you down to your platform and applies a debuff
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from Shade
All Blade Imp skills share the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot

primary.name: Blade Imp - Spin Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 155%, Number of Attacks: 4\nlasts 120 seconds, final damage from Shade's attack on marked enemies by 10%\nCooldown: 1 sec.
primary.desc: Spin to pull surrounding enemies to in front of you and applies a debuff
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from Shade
All Blade Imp skills share the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot

primary.name: Back Step
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Moves a certain distance backward.\n[Passive Effect: Avoidability: +15%]
primary.desc: Dash backwards
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Avoidability

primary.name: Spirit Bond 2
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, Speed: +22, Max Speed: +20

primary.name: Foxy Courage
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +15%

primary.name: Knuckle Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Knuckle Mastery: +50%, Critical Rate: +10%

primary.name: Strength Training
primary.shortDesc: STR: +60

primary.name: Shockwave Punch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20 per hit\nHit 1 - Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 4\nHit 2 - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 396%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Strike forward twice

primary.name: Spirit Frenzy
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 30, summons Spirit Frenzy for 45 sec and periodically deals damage
Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 6
Duration increases by 1 seconds for every enemy defeated with Spirit Frenzy, with a maximum increase of 15 seconds.
Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Summons a wall of spirits that damage enemies within it
details: Duration is increased when the skill defeats an enemy
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Spirit Trap
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 65, creates a trap that lasts for 10 seconds and reguarly deals damage.
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 3
Attacked enemies are stunned.
Stun Duration: +100%, depending on damage inflicted with Spirit Trap.
Cooldown: 120 sec.
primary.desc: Deploy a trap that binds enemies caught in it

primary.name: Summon Other Spirit
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150. When hit by an attack that would prove fatal, consumes the buff to deal 450% damage up to 15 enemies 4 times and make you invincible for 3 sec\nCooldown: 1800 sec
primary.desc: While toggled, when hit by a fatal attack, revive and damage nearby enemies
details: You are briefly invincible after reviving
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Spirit Bond 3
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +15%, Boss Damage: +20%

primary.name: Weaken
primary.shortDesc: Ignore Defense: +20%\n10% chance for an enervating spirit to possess enemies hit by attacks for 30 seconds.\nDamage increases by 20% when attacking an enemy possessed by an enervating spirit
primary.desc: Increases %Ignore DEF and grants successful attacks a chance to debuff enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Damage

primary.name: Total Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20, Damage: +20%, Critical Damage: +10%

primary.name: Harmonious Defense
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +1500, Status Resistance: +40, Elemental Resistance: +40%.

primary.name: Bomb Punch
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 20 per hit
Hit 1 - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage 225%, Number of Attacks: 4
Hit 2 - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 225%, Number of Attacks: 4
Hit 3 - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 225%, Number of Attacks: 4, Stun chance: 100%, Stun Duration: 2 sec
All attacks increases Damage Against Normal Enemies by 192%p points
primary.desc: Punch forward dealing an explosive attack
details: Can be used three times in a row<bp_The third attack stuns enemies hit_>
Attack gains increased %Damage against regular monsters by a flat amount

primary.name: Spirit Claw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Damage: 265%, Number of Attacks: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 3
primary.desc: Swipe forward damaging enemies

primary.name: Death Mark
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 600%, Number of Critical Hits: 8
Death Mark: Damage Over Time: 250% damage every 1 sec for 15 sec
HP Absorb Amount: 1% of damage dealt
Cooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Strike forward damaging and debuffing enemies
details: [Debuff]: Target takes damage over time and grants HP based on damage dealt by the debuff
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Soul Splitter
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 720%, Number of Attacks: 10
When an attack lands, the enemy's soul is split for 30 seconds, they are afflicted with a debuff, and a spirit flame is created for 10 seconds at the enemy's location. The duration increases up to 100% depending on the damage dealt with Soul Splitter.
Grants the Fire Spirit's Blessing for 30 seconds upon landing an attack. Party members inside the spirit flame obtain the Fire Spirit's Blessing for 10 seconds, and are unable to receive the blessing again for 110 seconds.
The Fire Spirit's Blessing increases Final Damage by 20% and party members by 15% when attacking an enemy afflicted with Soul Splitter debuff.
EXP increases by 100% when defeating an enemy afflicted with the Soul Splitter debuff.
Cooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Strike forward while debuffing enemies with "Soul Splitter" and creating a wall of blue flames
details: [Soul Splitter]: Party members with the "Fire Spirit's Blessing" buff deal increased %Final Damage to enemies with this debuff and EXP gained is increased when enemy is defeated
When used, instantly grants the 'Fire Spirit's Blessing' buff<bp_Party members can obtain the buff one-time when inside the wall of blue flames_>
The location the wall of blue flames is created will priortize bosses with the highest Max HP

primary.name: Spirit Ward
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 55, summons 3 guardian spirits for 30 seconds and creates a barrier.
Consumes 1 guardian spirit to nullify a debuff.
Cooldown: 60 sec
[Passive Effect: Activates Spirit Ward again when there are fewer than the maximum of guardian spirits, Cooldown: 100 sec]
primary.desc: Summons three guardian spirits that block debuffs
details: [Passive]: When there are fewer than the maximum guardian spirits, the skill will automatically activate (on a separate cooldown)<bp_Unaffected by cooldown resets_>
One guardian spirit is consumed after blocking a debuff

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Spirit Bond 4
primary.shortDesc: Ignore Defense: +30%, Boss Damage: +30%

primary.name: Heartfelt Communion
primary.shortDesc: Increases Spirit Frenzy attack range, dealing damage periodically. Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 8\nFox Spirits Damage: +75%p, Max Number of Attacks: +1
details: Increases the attack range and %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-frenzy.png} tip={Spirit Frenzy (3rd Job)}>
Increases the %Damage by a flat amount and number of attacks of <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits.png} tip={Fox Spirits (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Advanced Knuckle Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Knuckle Mastery: +70%, Final Damage: +16%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now increases %Final Damage

primary.name: Critical Insight
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +10%, Critical Damage: +18%, Final Damage: +10%

hyperPassive.name: Spirit Claw - Reinforce
details: Applies to <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-claw.png} tip={Spirit Claw (4th Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/true-spirit-claw.png} tip={True Spirit Claw (5th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Spirit Claw - Boss Rush
details: Applies to <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-claw.png} tip={Spirit Claw (4th Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/true-spirit-claw.png} tip={True Spirit Claw (5th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Spirit Claw - Extra Strike
details: Applies to <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-claw.png} tip={Spirit Claw (4th Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/true-spirit-claw.png} tip={True Spirit Claw (5th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Fox Spirits - Reinforce
details: Applies to <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits.png} tip={Fox Spirits (2nd Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-marble-fusion.png} tip={Fox Marble Fusion (Hyper Skill)}>

hyperPassive.name: Fox Spirits - Repeated Attack Bonus
details: Applies to <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits.png} tip={Fox Spirits (2nd Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-marble-fusion.png} tip={Fox Marble Fusion (Hyper Skill)}>

hyperPassive.name: Fox Spirits - Summon Chance
details: Applies to <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits.png} tip={Fox Spirits (2nd Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-marble-fusion.png} tip={Fox Marble Fusion (Hyper Skill)}>

hyperActive.name: Fox Marble Fusion
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 200
25% chance to summon 3 Fox Spirits Orbs when landing direct skill attacks for 30 seconds.
5% summon chance when hitting a boss with Bomb Punch.
Spirit Ward will be automatically activated one time if there are fewer than the maximum number of guardian spirits.
Fox Spirits Orb: Damage: 140%, Number of Attacks: 2, Disappears after a maximum of 3 attacks
Final Damage reduces by 20% when attack the same enemy multiple times
Cooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: While active, successful direct attack skills create 3 Fox Spirits Orbs that that seek and attack enemies up to 3 times
details: Reduced chance to create Fox Spirits when attacking bosses with <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/bomb-punch.png} tip={Bomb Punch (4th Job)}>
Enemies hit by multiple Fox Spirits Orbs take reduced %Final Damage after the first orb
When used, grants <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-ward.png} tip={Spirit Ward (4th Job)}> when there are less than the maximum guardian spirits

hyperActive.name: Spirit Incarnation
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost per attack: 50, Can hold key down for up to 8 sec, invincible during casting
Max enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 100%, Number of Attacks: 7
Reduces Cooldown by 5 seconds for every 1 seconds of remaining key hold-down time when the skill ends.
Cooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: While held, grants invincibility and slash enemies in a large area
details: Based on how long the skill was held, the cooldown will be shorter

hyperActive.name: Heroic Memories
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nOnly applies to hero classes within the party\nCooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Fox God Flash
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000
The Avatar of the Fox God incarnates, releasing 4 shockwaves which deal 330% damage to up to 15 enemies 7 times.
Increases Final Damage by 20% for 30 seconds, recovers 100% of max HP every 1 seconds
Foxlights activate regularly for 4 seconds while the buff lasts.
Once every 1 seconds, landing an attack will increase the Foxlight activation time by 4 seconds. Foxlights won't activate once their duration expires, even if the buff is ongoing.
Foxlight: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 385%, Number of Attacks: 10
Can be activated up to 60 times
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, increases %Final Damage and periodically triggers Foxlight attack
details: Foxlight only activates for a short period that can be extended by landing successful attacks while active<bp_When the duration ends, Foxlight will stop activating, even if the buff is still active_>
While active, regualarly restores all HP
Upon use, resets all skill cooldowns
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Spiritgate
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000
Opens the Spiritgate. Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 275%, Number of Attacks: 10, Energy Explosion Count: 5. Enemies hit by the energy are afflicted by a debuff for 45 seconds.
Attacking an enemy afflicted with the debuff increases Critical Rate by 80% and Critical Damage by 10%.
Afterwards, 30 Spirits of Darkness appear to pursue and attack enemies.
Spirit of Darkness: Damage: 935%, Number of Attacks: 5
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates an explosive attack that debuffs enemies and then releases Spirits of Darkness that seek and damage enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage
Spirits of Darkness prioritizes bosses with the highest HP in range first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: True Spirit Claw
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 880%, Number of Attacks: 12\nIgnore Defense: +50%, activates when Spirit Claw is used\nCooldown: 6 sec
fifthMain.desc: Periodically enhances <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-claw.png} tip={Spirit Claw (4th Job)}> when attack is used
details: Enhanced attack has increased %Ignore DEF

fifthMain.name: Smashing Multipunch
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60 per attack. Can hold key down for up to 1.8 seconds.
Periodically attack up to 10 enemies for 450% damage 10 times.
Make 14 shockwave attacks when the key is released, dealing 880% damage to up to 10 enemies 8 times.
During Smashing Multipunch, any attacks that inflict damage proportional to Max HP suffer a -50% damage penalty. Fox Spirits have a 50% chance to appear upon each hit.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: While held, furiously punch forward and then unleash a final attack
details: Successful punches have a chance to summon <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/fox-spirits.png} tip={Fox Spirits (2nd Job)}>
While casting, increases %Damage Reduction against %Max HP attacks

details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/shade/spirit-claw.png} tip={Spirit Claw (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Fox Spirits
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 20, 45% chance to summon Fox Spirits when landing direct skill attacks.
10% summon chance when landing a Bomb Punch on a Boss.
Damage: 352%, Number of Attacks: 2
Disappears after a maximum of 3 attacks.
[Passive Effect: HEXA Spirit Claw Damage: +40%p, Fox Marble Fusion Damage: +93%p]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Advent of the Fox
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 600%, Number of Attacks: 11, Times Attacking Light Appears: 28
Afterwards the spirit power explodes outward in 28 shockwaves, dealing 780% damage 13 times.
30 Final Blows deal 840% damage with 14 attacks.
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Shade is a STR pirate class part of the Heroes class group. Shade utilize Knuckles as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Shade can equip Fox Marbles
